title: Ora Kannaal Lyrics Attu
stanzas: <div>Ora Kannaal Ennai Paathaale Song Lyrics Attu

Oara kannaal ennai paathaale
yedho yedho ennai
maayam seithaale
enakkul kadhal thandhaale
thandhaale thandhaale(2)

urugudhe manam ye ke ye
parakkuren vinnil ye ke ke
malarudhe mugam Â ye ke ye
vandhadhae kadhal ye ye ye..

Oara kannaal ennai paathaale
yedho yedho maayam seithaale

Vidhiyaal unnai kandaen
vizhiyil unnai konden
iravu pagalaaga
imaigal moodaamal
unnai naan paarkiren

nodigal noolaagudhe
enakkul poo pookkudhe
yaarum illaadha nerangal kooda
un kural kaetkudhe.

irundhum irundhum
unnai paarkaadha nerangal
ayyaiyo adhu yeno
thee moottuthae.

nadai or vidham aaguthe
mozhiyum thadumaarudhe
ulagam ariyaadha
kuzhandhai aagindren
nee en arugil nindraal

imaiya kulir kaattrai pol
ullukkul uruvaaguthe
ooril illaadha vetkam
unargindren ne en
edhiril vandhaal

medhuvaa medhuvaa
en paerai nee sonnaale
azhagagum adhukooda
nee sollvathaal

thaniyaa thaniyaa
naan irundhaalum thaniyaaga
naanillai enakkulle
nee vandhathaal

Oara kannaal ennai paathaale
yedho yedho
maayam seithaale
enakkul kadhal thandhaale
thandhaale thandhaale
